Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Jingan Network (stock code: 832757), established in 2004, is a high-tech enterprise dedicated to the Internet service industry. The registered capital of the company is 52.01 million yuan, and it registered on the New Third Board in July 2015. Mainly engaged in Internet data center, cloud computing, "Internet +" industry solutions, and big data analysis and application and other related businesses.Jingan Network has Zhengzhou headquarters, Beijing branch and Guangzhou, Luoyang, Changsha, Hong Kong and other subsidiaries. Now self-constructed and operated the three data center bases of Henan Communication Industrial Park Data Center, Jing'an Luoyang IDC Cloud Computing Industrial Park, and Hunan Unicom Changsha Cloud Data Center, with a connection rate of 99.995%; Communication, cloud computing, big data, etc. provide stable and secure data center access services. As of now, the number of service users is 500,000+; the number of website accesses has reached 30+, ranking third in the country.So there are lots of encrypted data that need to be stored.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: They are mainly the server access log data and smart video from our company.It updates with the time goes by. At present we have 3PiB data and want make 5 coyies.
